name: Everybody Beefs
description:
'Everybody Beefs' is a mobile platform that allows music artists, comedians, and other entertainers to promote themselves to a broad audience. The catch is that the user will also have the opportunity to *FIGHT* as one of the entertainers in the game!

This is an amazing platform to allow entertainers to promote, market, and brand themselves to a large mobile market. Download 'Everybody Beefs' Today!


Features:
- Great 3D Graphics!
- Hot hip-hop tracks!
- Simple fighting controls!
- Special moves for each entertainer!
- Opportunities to be featured on the game!
- Available for iPhone and iPad
